alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 25 at 3:24PM EST until January 26 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.0 to 7.3 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol MA and Southern Plymouth MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM Wednesday to 3 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along the most vulnerable shoreline locales in Newport, Portsmouth and Middletown. This includes flooding at parking lots near beaches in Newport, and a portion of Hazard Road. Minor coastal flooding also occurs on several streets in the Common Fence Point area. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
